title: Intego Yacu
missionStatement: Gushyira uburezi bufite ireme ku mwana wese, aho ari ho hose, binyuze mu mbaraga z’urugendo rwo kuzigama rufite intego.
missionBelief: Twemera ko igihe abantu bazigama bafite intego kandi batanga mu buryo bugaragara, dushobora guhanga impinduka z’igihe kirekire mu miryango hirya no hino ku isi.
visionSubtitle: Isi aho buri mwana wese afite ibikoresho byo kwiga
visionP1: Tubona ejo hazaza aho nta mwana ucyangwa uburezi kubera kubura ibikoresho. Aho ibikoresho by’ishuri, ibitabo n’ibikoresho by’ubumenyi biboneka kuri buri mwana, hatitawe ku mibereho ye y’imari.
visionP2: Binjinjiyemo AidVault, turubaka umuryango mpuzamahanga w’abazigama basobanukiwe ko intego zabo bwite z’imari zishobora kubana—kandi zikongera—iryifuzo ryabo ryo gutanga.
visionP3: Icyerekezo cyacu si ugutanga ibikoresho gusa. Ni ugushinga uburyo burambye aho ubuntu buhinduka igice gisanzwe mu igenamigambi ry’imari, kandi aho ingaruka zo gutanga zigaragara, zipimwa kandi zifite agaciro.
universalAccess: Uburenganzira Bwo Kwiga Ku Buri Mwana
sustainableImpactDesc: Impinduka z’igihe kirekire, ntabwo ari inkunga gusa
educationEqualizerDesc: Mu buryo bwose bwo guhanga impinduka nziza, twahisemo uburezi ku mpamvu imwe yoroshye: burakora.
breaksCycleDesc: Abana bahabwa uburezi bufite ireme bafite amahirwe 2x yo kuva mu bukene no gutanga umusanzu mwiza mu miryango yabo. Uburezi butanga amahirwe akwirakwira ku nkomoko nyinshi.
highImpactDesc: Amafaranga 60,000 RWF gusa ashobora gutanga ibikoresho by’ishuri ku mwana umwaka wose. Ni imwe mu nyungu nyinshi mu gutanga inkunga—ingaruka zigaragara ku musanzu muto.
empowersCommunitiesDesc: Abana bize bazakura bagahinduka abayobozi b’imiryango, abarimu, abaganga, n’abacuruzi. Mu gushora mu burezi, turashora mu buyobozi bw’ejo hazaza bw’uturere twose.
goalsDesc: Tugena intego zihanitse ariko zishoboka kandi dukurikirana intambwe zacu mu mucyo

goals.description: Abana bafite uburezi bufite ireme bitarenze 2026
Abatanga inkunga bakora mu muryango mpuzamahanga wacu

transparencyDesc: Twemera ko ukwiye kumenya neza uburyo umusanzu wawe ukoreshwa. Dore neza uburyo dutanga buri RWF yatanzwe binyuze muri AidVault.
joinMissionDesc: Buri muziga winjira muri AidVault aba igice cy’ikintu kinini. Tangira urugendo rwawe uyu munsi kandi ufasha kugera ku ntego zacu.
